ingredients.ingredient: 1 (8 ounce) package reduced-fat cream cheese (Neufchatel), softened
¾ (16 ounce) package frozen chopped spinach, thawed and drained
1 clove garlic, minced, or more to taste
¼ teaspoon red pepper flakes, or more to taste

cookingTips: Brown sausage completely and break into small pieces for easy distribution
Squeeze spinach very dry to prevent soggy crescents
Fill crescents while filling is still warm for easier spreading
enrichment.coachingPrompt: These crescents are handheld appetizers. Are you comfortable working with refrigerated dough?
